title: Forbidden Someday
description: Daren and Carter have been the best of friends since birth. Until they become something more.Carter is the everyday average teen sports star. He's got the girls, the skills, and the popularity. What he wants is for his best friend to date him, and he's willing to give everything he has in order to get the chance. With Daren being a social outcast, keeping his past a secret, and hiding behind insecurities, their relationship is taken to new heights. Both of them are waiting for the day when they can put everything aside and just be happy; their Forbidden Someday.This story has a PG to PG-13 rating and is a romance for homosexual teens. It's a unique story told from both point of views; Daren's and Carter's."While Daren deals with his past, Carter tries to make a future for himself. Good read."
author: M. Acen
